data.title: Lots of fun
data.text: A lot of great concerts and festivals all summer long.Christmas tree lighting is coming up lots of great fun,awesome fireworks show

data.title: cheap date
data.text: free parking  .......restaurants close..........safe area    walk to canal ball park.......free music  on Fridays  NEXT YEAR  sorry

data.title: Not bad
data.text: Very large area with no shelter and no seating, but a nice enough place for free concerts. Crowded, but that's to be expected when the entertainment is free. Fairly clean and easily accessible. Security isn't great. I usually carry a minimum of two pocketknives at all times, and although security checked my purse, they didn't see either of them - and both were easily visible, one clipped in a pocket inside my purse, and the other clipped in a pocket on the outside of my purse. It really never occurred to me that they might check, so when they did, I expected them to send me back to my car to leave my knives, but since they didn't even see obviously placed ones, I don't think they're doing a stellar job. So that's a concern, in my opinion. However, I did not witness any fights or other obvious disturbances, so that was good. The sound system is fantastic. Remember to bring lawn chairs! Honestly, it isn't a place I would go to frequently because I don't like crowds or being outdoors, but a friend's band was playing, and I wasn't going to miss that. I'm really glad I went, though, because seriously, the sound system really is fantastic. My friend's band sounded even better than usual, and really, even better than at most venues where I've seen them.

data.title: Great venue!
data.text:
I have been to the Lock many times - and will go many many more times. I couldn't believe this gem was right in my back yard and I never knew about it until this year!
So many awesome concerts to go to - all free! Great music, great lawn seats (not a bad seat in the house)...bring your own chairs...and amazing food venue options! I recommend the mozzarella sticks and whatever beer you like out of their great selection.
In the winter, the stage is transformed into an outdoor ice skating rink and is a blast to enjoy not to mention warm yourself by the fire and grab a hot chocolate!
Such a great family place to come and enjoy - all for low prices or free!

data.title: Great Summer Fun!
data.text: The concert series at Lock 3 is super-great! Many concerts are free or have a small fee. Bring a lawn chair and just enjoy some of the best entertainment around! I have been going for years and look forward to each Summer's schedule! It is a fun, casual evening of music!

data.title: Summer Music
data.text: This is the place to be on Friday nights in the summer for outstanding music.  They bring in the top tribute bands and if you sit back and close your eyes, you'd think you are seeing the real act.  Family friendly and we always feel safe at this venue.

data.title: Stay away. Hang out for kids.
data.text:
Went to a free concert and all it had was unruly kids, saw a fight,
dirty, very little security and bad parking.
Stay away unless you have nothing to do.

data.title: Great concert series
data.text: fantastic venue for live music in the summer.. street fair style with vendors, great bands, restaurants near by.  free free free!

data.title: So much for free
data.text: Weather it is for Rock the Lock or one of the many festivals held at Lock 3 it is always an entertaining time.  Winterfest is sure to please with the ice skating and sled hill.  Great summer concerts. And oh the fireworks.  Only wish they would have left the Lebron banner up.

data.title: With friends!
data.text: At The Prince Experience. Raining but so awesome. Live so close.....don't know why we have never been here before. Must make it again and again.

data.title: Great music free and family fun
data.text: Great music free and family fun! Vendors so you can grab a bite they also serve beer. Fun alone with someone and or family

data.title: Great for all!
data.text: This is a great place to go. They have alto of different things going on all year round. From the Caves win to skating in the winter, they have a party and it's fun.

data.title: Liek the location and nice place to eat for a casual family night out.
data.text: Food was good, service was fine. Lots of great drink options. Perfect place to visit on a game night or festival night.

data.title: Many different menus of activities
data.text: You and the young ones can enjoy all the activities held here during the year. Every thing from sports, concerts, fund raiser and so much more. The local Police Officers are visible and keep you safe .... If that is a concern ..... But not one that I worried about while there.

data.title: famliy fun
data.text: The area is very nice in the winter, but I wish they had more of the little shops open for people not wishing to skate.

data.title: Nice events for the Akron area
data.text: I like that they always have something going on. Lock 3 gives Akron area residents something to look forward to doing.

data.title: Wonderful Concert Venue !
data.text: C'mon, free concert...free live music....how can it not be good?  Does it really matter what type of music it is....it's  summertime...just go ?!  Plenty of room to relax.  Plenty of room to dance.  Drinks and Snacks at reasonable prices. Parking is free.  Give it a try !

data.title: Lock 3 - once a part of the NE Ohio Lock System
data.text: The lock system did a lot to the development of Akron.  Lock 3 is now in the center of the city.  Musicals are held, fireworks are set off among other things.  At Christmas, Lock 3 becomes the site of a Kris Kindel Mart and an ice skating center.  Do call to see what excitement will be happening.  Lock 3 is interesting and exciting if something is going on.

data.title: great venue in the middle of downtown akron
data.text: ok this is a venue that requires walking @ however if ur handicapped/wheel chair access there is NO problem. There is a parking deck right south of the venue which you can then "roll" into Lock3 with no hassle.  There are usually food booths for bigger events or concerts....and also restaurants right across the street from it as well as the ball park just south of it........... lotsa great concerts every thurs & fridays  the Flai Fest is being held here in late august and Steve Grand is at the Civic theater next to it!!!

data.title: Always a fun excursion!
data.text: We have been to just about every event at Lock 3 at sometime or another and always have a good time.  The atmosphere and the huge area for concerts and events is great.
